content: अलंघ्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not to be transgressed, overcome &c.; <ls>Śi. 3. 64.</ls> {@--2@} Beyond the reach of, impossible to be done; <ls>Ki. 13. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Difficult to secure or attain, unattainable; <ls>Ki. 10. 6</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 10.">13</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 57</ls>; °ता state of being proof against an attack or injury; <ls>Ki. 11. 63.</ls>
